Package com.ms.gradle.application

Class ApplicationPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ms.gradle.application.ApplicationPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin<Project>
    public class ApplicationPlugin
extends Object
implements Plugin<Project>
    Gradle Plugin class that implements Morgan Stanley's Application plugin.

      • getApplications

        @Nonnull
public NamedDomainObjectContainer<Application> getApplications()

        This method allows type-safe programmatic access to the Application container used by this plugin.

        Usage: project.getPlugins().getPlugin(ApplicationPlugin.class).getApplications()

        Returns:
        The Application container used by this plugin.
        See Also:
        EXTENSION_NAME, EXTENSION_TYPE
